attributes.action: Stop feminists telling us what mags we can and cannot look at
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The campaign against lads mags by groups such as Object and charlie_grrl isn't about getting their sale properly regulated but about getting their sale completly banned.
Most of their campaign is about personal distaste for these magazines rather than any actual harm caused by their content.
People should be free to choose what they read and stores shouldn't deny their customers that choice because a few feminists don't want them looking at certain mags.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
